scripts.build: eslint . --ext .ts && rimraf dist && tsc -p tsconfig-build.json && set NODE_ENV=development  && swaggerGen -c ./swaggerConfig.json -p ./tsconfig.json
scripts.build:test: eslint . --ext .ts && rimraf dist && tsc -p tsconfig-build.json && set NODE_ENV=development  && swaggerGen -c ./swaggerConfig.json -p ./tsconfig.json && npm run test
scripts.start:dev: eslint . --ext .ts && rimraf dist && tsc -p tsconfig-build.json && swaggerGen -c ./swaggerConfig.json -p ./tsconfig.json && node ./dist/app.js
scripts.debug: eslint . --ext .ts && rimraf dist && tsc -p tsconfig-build.json && set NODE_ENV=development  && swaggerGen -c ./swaggerConfig.json -p ./tsconfig.json && node ./dist/app.js
scripts.nodemon: eslint . --ext .ts && rimraf dist && tsc -p tsconfig-build.json && set NODE_ENV=development  && swaggerGen -c ./swaggerConfig.json -p ./tsconfig.json && nodemon ./dist/app.js
